Title: Relates to authorizing the department of health to develop regulations pertaining to hard of hearing hospital patients and others
Summary: Authorizes and directs the department of health to develop regulations pertaining to hard of hearing hospital patients and others.
LawCode: Add ยง2805-z, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to authorizing the health department to develop regulations pertaining to hard of hearing hospital patients and others
